Text: Guru Dutt:  In particular, "Pyaasa" and "Kaagaz Ke Phool" are now included among the greatest films of all time, both by Time magazine's "All-TIME" 100 best movies and by the "Sight & Sound" critics' and directors' poll, where Dutt himself is included among the greatest film directors of all time.
Triplets:<Guru Dutt
